alert.note: Alert for Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 04 at 11:00PM PDT until November 05 at 6:04AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon and Washington... Trask River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Washington... Naselle River near Naselle affecting Wahkiakum and Pacific Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trask River near Tillamook. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...Above 16.5 feet, expect minor flooding along the lower Trask River. Dairy farms, buildings, and a few residences adjacent to the Trask in the vicinity of Hwy 101 may be threatened. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM PDT Friday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage to 16.9 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling through Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 16.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning by 10 am PDT.
